entry.title: gridlastic
entry.content:
gridlastic 是一个SELENIUM GRID云服务平台。
https://www.gridlastic.com

价格

试用

注册需要使用商务邮箱，免费的邮箱，如163，yahoo，gmail等邮箱不能注册。

entry.title: Smart home
entry.content:
• 智能家居用于老年人医疗保健 - 最新进展和研究挑战
    https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/17/11/2496

Smart Homes for Elderly Healthcare—Recent Advances and Research Challenges

综述性文献

  • 用于远程医疗和应急管理的智能家居技术

https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s12652-012-0129-8

Smart home technology for telemedicine and emergency management

  • 老年人对使用无线传感器网络协助医疗保健的认知和接受程度

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1386505609001178

Elderly persons’ perception and acceptance of using wireless sensor networks to assist healthcare

调查问卷: 定性研究

  • 用物联网开发老年人医疗监控系统
    Development of the Elderly Healthcare Monitoring System with IoT
  • 用于智能家居中无处不在的老年健康护理的信息和通信技术

Information and communications technologies for elderly ubiquitous healthcare in a smart home

https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2802684

远程医疗监控 智能穿戴设备

  • A Secure and Dependable Connected Smart Home System for Elderly

介绍一种安全的智能家居解决方案

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/8328470

  • 基于智能家居网关的老年人远程健康监测系统
    A Remote Health Monitoring System for the Elderly Based on Smart Home Gateway

https://www.hindawi.com/journals/jhe/2017/5843504/abs/

智能服装收集老年人的心电图（ECG）和运动信号

  • Evolution of Smart Homes for the Elderly

https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=3054928

从六个方面(安全，健康和营养，身体活动，个人卫生和护理，社交参与和休闲)介绍智能家居对老年人的帮助。

Design of sustainable smart homes for elderly

https://web.a.ebscohost.com/abstract?direct=true&profile=ehost&scope=site&authtype=crawler&jrnl=16307267&AN=117972718&h=9oI9bZntcg1xVXGPLu%2bb%2fj5Ptnc%2buZVmZIVVCjI2oGA2Fo1apFc%2fjv78sGiKSQyNmc9fLgrqQo%2fo8diboyr%2bsw%3d%3d&crl=c&resultNs=AdminWebAuth&resultLocal=ErrCrlNotAuth&crlhashurl=login.aspx%3fdirect%3dtrue%26profile%3dehost%26scope%3dsite%26authtype%3dcrawler%26jrnl%3d16307267%26AN%3d117972718

A Survey on the Internet of Things Solutions for the
Elderly and Disabled: Applications, Prospects, and
Challenges

http://www.ijcna.org/Manuscripts/IJCNA-2017-O-08.pdf

物联网技术在老年人和失能人士领域的应用调查

  • 智能家居系统设计中的隐私原则

Privacy Principles in Design of Smart Homes Systems in Elderly Care

https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-319-20376-8_47

提出几个隐私设计原则

技术类:

Towards a Synergy of Qualitative Spatio-Temporal Reasoning and
Smart Environments for Assisting the Elderly at Home

http://qrg.northwestern.edu/qr2017/papers/QR2017_paper_6.pdf

定性时空推理

A review on smart home technology

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/7453832

智能家居技术的文献综述

Assistive design for elderly living ambient using voice and gesture recognition system

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/8122714

声音和手势识别系统

Smart Healthcare: An Approach for Ubiquitous Healthcare Management Using IoT

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/B9780128181461000076

IoT 与智能健康护理

Context-aware low power intelligent SmartHome based on the Internet of things

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0045790616300933

基于IOT的环境感知低功耗智能家居

A wearable sensor based elderly home care system in a smart environment

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/7488091

基于可穿戴传感器的老年人家庭护理系统

A review of smart home applications based on Internet of Things

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1084804517302801

关于IoT 在智能家居中的应用的文献综述

SMARTA: Smart Ambiente and Wearable Home Monitoring for Elderly

https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-319-47063-4_54

使用生物医学传感器和传感器服装进行健康状况收集和心脏监测
entry.summary:
• 智能家居用于老年人医疗保健 - 最新进展和研究挑战
    https://www.mdpi.co

entry.title: echarts demo
git 多账号配置
entry.content:
同一客户端多个git账号生成多份rsa秘钥实现多个账户同时使用

ssh-keygen

➜  Workspace git:(master) ✗ ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa.coding -C "xxxx@xxx.xxx"Generating public/private rsa key pair.Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase):Enter same passphrase again:Your identification has been saved in /home/xxx/.ssh/id_rsa.coding.Your public key has been saved in /home/xxx/.ssh/id_rsa.coding.pub.The key fingerprint is:24:e0:d2:1d:d7:da:87:d8:f7:d7:aa:70:25:f0:3f:e9 xxxx@xxx.xxxThe key's randomart image is:+--[ RSA 2048]----+|    . . ..       ||   o o o  .      ||  . o o .=..     ||   .   oo +oo    ||        S  oo.. .||             +..o||          . . +o ||           o ... ||            ..E  |+-----------------+➜  Workspace git:(master) ✗ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa.codingIdentity added: /home/xxx/.ssh/id_rsa.coding (/home/xxx/.ssh/id_rsa.coding)

config

touch ~/.ssh/config

Host github.com    User xxx    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa    PreferredAuthentications publickeyHost git.coding.net    HostName git.coding.net    User xxx    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsaHost git.coding.net    HostName git.coding.net    User xxx2    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa.coding
entry.summary: 同一客户端多个git账号生成多份rsa秘钥实现多个账户同时使用

entry.title: spark-shell
entry.content:
启动spark-shell sqlContext

➜  ~  spark-shell15/09/15 11:19:01 WARN NativeCodeLoader: Unable to load native-hadoop library for your platform... using builtin-java classes where applicableWelcome to      ____              __     / __/__  ___ _____/ /__    _\ \/ _ \/ _ `/ __/  '_/   /___/ .__/\_,_/_/ /_/\_\   version 1.4.1scala> val sqlContext = new org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext(sc)sqlContext: org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext = org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext@51d6cda7scala> import sqlContext.implicits._import sqlContext.implicits._

json

people.json内容：

{"name":"Michael"}{"name":"Andy", "age":30}{"name":"Justin", "age":19}

json打开为dataframe：

scala> val df = sqlContext.read.json("/home/zyz/Program/spark-1.4.1-bin-hadoop2.6/examples/src/main/resources/people.json")df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [age: bigint, name: string]scala> df.show()+----+-------+| age|   name|+----+-------+|null|Michael||  30|   Andy||  19| Justin|+----+-------+scala> df.printSchema()root |-- age: long (nullable = true) |-- name: string (nullable = true)scala> df.select("name").show()+-------+|   name|+-------+|Michael||   Andy|| Justin|+-------+scala> df.select(df("name"), df("age") + 1).show()+-------+---------+|   name|(age + 1)|+-------+---------+|Michael|     null||   Andy|       31|| Justin|       20|+-------+---------+scala> df.filter(df("age") > 21).show()+---+----+|age|name|+---+----+| 30|Andy|+---+----+scala> df.groupBy("age").count().show()+----+-----+                                                                    | age|count|+----+-----+|null|    1||  19|    1||  30|    1|+----+-----+

将df 注册为临时表

scala> df.registerTempTable("people")scala> val teenagers = sqlContext.sql("SELECT name, age FROM people WHERE age >= 13 AND age <= 19")teenagers: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [name: string, age: bigint]scala> teenagers.map(t => "Name: " + t(0)).collect().foreach(println)Name: Justinscala> teenagers.map(t => "Name: " + t.getAs[String]("name")).collect().foreach(println)Name: Justin

txt

people.txt内容：

Michael, 29Andy, 30Justin, 19

用textFile打开（RDD），记录转换为类，再转为dataframe （toDF）：

scala> case class Person(name: String, age: Int)defined class Personscala> val people = sc.textFile("/home/zyz/Program/spark-1.4.1-bin-hadoop2.6/examples/src/main/resources/people.txt").map(_.split(",")).map(p => Person(p(0), p(1).trim.toInt)).toDF()people: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [name: string, age: int]scala> people.show()+-------+---+|   name|age|+-------+---+|Michael| 29||   Andy| 30|| Justin| 19|+-------+---+

或者采用createDataFrame

scala> val people = sc.textFile("/home/zyz/Program/spark-1.4.1-bin-hadoop2.6/examples/src/main/resources/people.txt")people: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[64] at textFile at <console>:28scala> val schemaString = "name age"schemaString: String = name agescala> import org.apache.spark.sql.Row;import org.apache.spark.sql.Rowscala> import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType,StructField,StringType};import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType}scala> val schema =     |   StructType(     |     schemaString.split(" ").map(fieldName => StructField(fieldName, StringType, true)))schema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(name,StringType,true), StructField(age,StringType,true))scala> val rowRDD = people.map(_.split(",")).map(p => Row(p(0), p(1).trim))rowRDD: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = MapPartitionsRDD[58] at map at <console>:30scala> val peopleDataFrame = sqlContext.createDataFrame(rowRDD, schema)peopleDataFrame: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [name: string, age: string]

其他数据源

scala> val user = sqlContext.read.load("/home/zyz/Program/spark-1.4.1-bin-hadoop2.6/examples/src/main/resources/users.parquet")user: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [name: string, favorite_color: string, favorite_numbers: array<int>]scala> user.select("name", "favorite_color").show()+------+--------------+|  name|favorite_color|+------+--------------+|Alyssa|          null||   Ben|           red|+------+--------------+
entry.summary:
启动spark-shell sqlContext

➜  ~  spark-shell
15/09/15 11:19:01 WARN NativeCodeLoader: Unable to load native-hadoop library for your platform... using builtin-java classes where applicable
Welcome to
      ____              __
     / __/__  ___ _____/ /__
    _\ \/ _ \/ _ `/ __/  '_/
   /___/ .__/\_,_/_/ /_/\_\   version 1.4.1


scala> val sqlContext = new org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext(sc)
sqlContext: org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext = org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext@51d6cda7

scala> import sqlContext.implicits._
import sqlContext.implicits._
